trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Dichiara le autorizzazioni per il caricamento dei tipi da assembly usati da un writer o un reader XAML.

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: XamlLoadPermission è pertinente per gli scenari, ad esempio se sono consentiti i tipi interni per caricare con attendibilità parziale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> classe, utilizzando un set enumerabile di specifico <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata a questo costruttore inizializza la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>insieme a ogni `allowedAccess` voce come un elemento e imposta il valore restituito per <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>per `false` nell'istanza creata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Set enumerabile di specifico <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccesscontiene informazioni non valide, ad esempio un elemento null.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> classe, utilizzando le autorizzazioni esistenti.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>Imposta il valore restituito per <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>per `true` nell'istanza creata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi chiamata a questo costruttore imposta la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>insieme a `null` perché non è rilevante se le autorizzazioni vengono segnalate anziché <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> utilizzando una singola classe <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Una chiamata a questo costruttore inizializza la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>insieme con `allowedAccess` come unico elemento e imposta il valore restituito per <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>per `false` nell'istanza creata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: La definizione di <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elenco di tutti i <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valori <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se corrente <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>viene inizializzato in modo che <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>è `true`, potrebbe essere AllowedAccess `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di sola lettura di <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valori, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la sezione Osservazioni.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea e restituisce una copia identica dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Per il contratto di interfaccia di <xref:System.Security.IPermission>questo valore è <xref:System.Security.IPermission>nella firma, ma può essere convertito in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una copia dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Ricostruisce un oggetto di sicurezza con uno stato specificato da una codifica XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: La codifica XML da usare per ricostruire l'oggetto di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: elemnon contiene la codifica XML per un .

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: L'attributo della versione in - oppure - elem non è supportata.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce se questo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> include un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> nel relativo <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>elenco.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: La specifica <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> da cercare.

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: Se requestedAccess esiste come elemento di elenco dell'oggetto corrente .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccessè null.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crea e restituisce un <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> che rappresenta l'intersezione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e l'autorizzazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Per l'operatore union, intersect e subset, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>viene innanzitutto verificato e potrebbe restituire un risultato basato solamente su tale controllo.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>è selezionata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> da intersecare con l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nuova autorizzazione che rappresenta l'intersezione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e il valore specificato <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: La nuova autorizzazione è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se l'intersezione è vuota.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> è un subset dell'autorizzazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Per l'operatore union, intersect e subset, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>viene innanzitutto verificato e potrebbe restituire un risultato basato solamente su tale controllo.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>è selezionata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `target` è `null` corrente e <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>sia <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` e dispone di un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>elencare, questo metodo restituisce `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Autorizzazione da testare per la relazione del subset.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> è un subset di quella specificata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce se questo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> specifica autorizzazioni senza restrizioni.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> specifica autorizzazioni senza restrizioni.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Se questo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> dispone di restrizioni a livello di accesso specifici <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, o non dispone di autorizzazioni.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Crea una codifica XML dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e lo stato corrente.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Codifica XML dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>, incluse eventuali informazioni sullo stato.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'autorizzazione che rappresenta l'unione di corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e l'autorizzazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Per l'operatore union, intersect e subset, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>viene innanzitutto verificato e potrebbe restituire un risultato basato solamente su tale controllo.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>è selezionata.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `other` è `null`, corrente <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>viene restituito.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> da combinare con corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> che rappresenta l'unione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e il valore specificato <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: other is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: otheris not or is not a .
